benchmark_details.name: LuxGen
benchmark_details.overview: LuxGen is a text generation benchmark for Luxembourgish, introducing four new text generation tasks and evaluating model performance in this under-represented language.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the performance of text generation models in Luxembourgish and to fill the gap in benchmarks for this language.

data.source: Compiled from Luxembourgish news articles, transcribed interviews, user comments, and Wikipedia articles.
data.annotation: Manual processing and selection of text data.

methodology.calculation: The BLEU score is used to evaluate text generation output based on n-gram overlaps with reference texts.
methodology.interpretation: Higher BLEU scores indicate better alignment with the target text outputs.
methodology.baseline_results: Compared against LUXT5, mT5, and Llama models.
methodology.validation: Results from multiple tasks evaluated for model performance.
